<script>function replaceWithDefaultFavicon(img) {
  img.onerror = "";
  img.crossOrigin='true';
  img.src = "https://www.g2.com/assets/question-50fdf34e0856fc4dfc534e72c65f8718088b3be375f4820932d751e62057c420.png";
  return true;
}</script><script>function replaceWithDefaultImg(img, src) {
  img.onerror = "";
  img.src = src;
  return true;
}

function replaceWithDefaultThumb(img) {
  return replaceWithDefaultImg(img, "https://www.g2.com/assets/fallback/defaultthumb-97cd53a46372b6b7058149106c7e5e3ac135a98e91b0877e430de6e8faf7e41e.png");
}

function replaceWithDefaultDetail(img) {
  return replaceWithDefaultImg(img, "https://www.g2.com/assets/fallback/default-6632ce065b4875adb88aec465e288328b3a998ba2d0d6e27ffe5a7ea65497efc.png");
}

function replaceWithAvatar(img) {
  return replaceWithDefaultImg(img, "https://www.g2.com/assets/icons/anonymous-avatar-rorange-fd9203f82b4bce0d014644f4c61011fb28de19a479b95c263fb9561b90995bc9.svg");
}

function replaceWithMonogram(img) {
  img.classList.remove('monogram__hider');
  img.classList.add('is-hidden');

  img.nextSibling.style.display = 'flex';
  img.style.display = 'none';
}</script><script>function hideBrokenImage(img) { img.style.display='none'; }</script><script>
  function preEvent(el, ev) {
    el.addEventListener('vvidget:initialized', function (e) {
      $(el).trigger(ev);
    }, false);
  }
</script>

data-pjax-scroll-to="false" data-pjax-timeout="10000" id="ajax-container" ue="pjax"><meta content="2024-01-08" itemprop="datePublished dateModified lastReviewed" /><meta content="https://www.g2.com/categories/seo-tools" itemprop="url" /><meta content="Best SEO Tools" itemprop="name" /><meta content="Search engine optimization (SEO) tools, or organic search marketing software, are designed to provide insight into organic marketing metrics and improve the ranking of websites in search engine results pages (SERPs) without paying the search engine provider for placement. These tools provide valuable insights for optimizing content and improving rankings. Product teams, marketers, and SEO specialists commonly use these solutions to identify areas for enhancement and outperform competitors in search engines." itemprop="description" /><meta content="https://www.g2.com/categories/marketing" itemprop="relatedLink" /><div itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/FAQPage"><div class="no-border-radius" data-poison-text=""><div class="bg-white p-r"><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x category-products" id="product-list-sticky-container"><div class="cell large-12 pt-0 p-r" id="product-list" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/ItemList"><link href="http://schema.org/ItemListOrderDescending" itemprop="itemListOrder" /><meta content="495" itemprop="numberOfItems" /><meta content="Best SEO Tools" itemprop="name" /><h1 class="l1" id="main">Best SEO Tools</h1><ul class="list list--spaced list--spaced--with-divider"><li><a data-event-options="{&quot;category_id&quot;:250,&quot;category&quot;:&quot;SEO Tools&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Event::Categories::LearnMoreLinkClicked&quot;}" class=" js-log-click" href="#learn-more"><h3 class="l3 mb-0 link d-ib">What are SEO Tools?</h3></a></li></ul><div class="mt-half mb-2"><div class="overflow-scrollbar-auto max-h-30" data-max-height-expand-show-less-text="Show Less&lt;svg xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&quot; contain=&quot;paint&quot; buffered-rendering=&quot;static&quot; viewBox=&quot;0 0 10 10&quot; class=&quot;ml-half py-1/12 icon-chevron-thin nessy-only&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot; focusable=&quot;false&quot; role=&quot;presentation&quot;&gt;&lt;path d=&quot;M10.001 8.015V3.957L5.017.915l-5.016 3v4l5-3z&quot;&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;" data-max-height-expand-show-more-text="Show More&lt;svg xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&quot; contain=&quot;paint&quot; buffered-rendering=&quot;static&quot; viewBox=&quot;0 0 10 10&quot; class=&quot;ml-half py-1/12 r-180 icon-chevron-thin nessy-only&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot; focusable=&quot;false&quot; role=&quot;presentation&quot;&gt;&lt;path d=&quot;M10.001 8.015V3.957L5.017.915l-5.016 3v4l5-3z&quot;&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;" data-max-height-expand-theme="white" data-max-height-expand-type="category header revealer" ue="max-height-expand"><div class="admin-text"><p>Search engine optimization (SEO) tools, or organic search marketing software, are designed to provide insight into organic marketing metrics and improve the ranking of websites in search engine results pages (SERPs) without paying the search engine provider for placement. These tools provide valuable insights for optimizing content and improving rankings. Product teams, marketers, and SEO specialists commonly use these solutions to identify areas for enhancement and outperform competitors in search engines.</p>


<p>SEO tools cover a range of features and functionalities for optimizing a website’s performance. SEO auditing identifies content or technical issues, rank-tracking monitors keywords' performance in SERP, and link-building improves off-page SEO by monitoring backlinks and identifying new opportunities. Keyword research helps with keyword suggestions, identifying alternative search terms, and analyzing keyword difficulty and search volume. Finally, reporting aggregates all of this data to track progress and optimize SEO strategies. Other features like content optimization, SEO automation, and semantic SEO also provide webmasters with different ways to enhance a website's content and rank.</p>


<p>Further, some software solutions also offer features for <a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/local-seo">local SEO</a>, which lets businesses track local rankings, manage local listings, and discover top-ranking local keywords. Additionally, SEO tools may provide paid search optimization features, such as pay-per-click (PPC) ad optimization, conversion metrics, and ad placement. (To learn more about search advertising products, please visit our <a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/search-advertising">search advertising software category</a>.)</p>


<p>
</p><p><strong>Best SEO Tools at a glance:</strong></p>
 
<div><strong>Best for small business:</strong> <a href="https://www.g2.com/products/semrush/reviews">Semrush</a> </div>
<div><strong>Best for mid-market:</strong> <a href="https://www.g2.com/products/semrush/reviews">Semrush</a> </div>
<div><strong>Best for enterprise:</strong> <a href="https://www.g2.com/products/similarweb/reviews">Similarweb</a> </div>
<div><strong>Best by G2 user satisfaction:</strong> <a href="https://www.g2.com/products/rankiq/reviews">RankIQ</a> </div>
<div><strong>Best free SEO Tool:</strong> <a href="https://www.g2.com/products/semrush/reviews">Semrush</a> </div>
 
<p>

</p><p>These software solutions are ranked using an algorithm that calculates customer satisfaction and market presence based on reviews from our user community. For more information, please check out <a href="https://documentation.g2.com/docs/research-scoring-methodologies">G2’s Research Scoring Methodology</a>.</p>

<p>To qualify for inclusion in the SEO Tools category, a product must:</p>
 
<div>Perform functions like content optimization, SEO audits, keyword research, rank tracking, link building, and backlink monitoring</div>
<div>Provide reports on optimization-related metrics</div>
<div>Focus on the improvement in free, organic search engine listings</div>

data-truncate-revealer-limit="200" data-truncate-revealer-overflow-text="
SE Ranking offers dedicated tools for automating every major SEO task, including keyword and competitive research, content creation and optimization, technical website audits, on-page optimization, backlink analysis and monitoring, position tracking, local SEO, and more.

SE Ranking leverages AI and NLP technologies to provide users with unique insights and recommendations. Delivering high-quality, accurate data is one of SE Ranking’s top priorities, and the SE Ranking team continually expands their datasets and finetunes their data processing algorithms to provide data that users can rely on.

Teams can benefit from SE Ranking’s automated reporting, White Label, and collaborative project management. Most subscription plans include extra user seats for team members and unlimited projects to accommodate all client needs. 

Designed specifically for small to mid-sized marketing agencies, SE Ranking’s Agency Pack provides unlimited reporting, a lead generation widget, WL, and extra client seats to help agencies better present their deliverables." data-truncate-revealer-show-less="Show Less" data-truncate-revealer-show-more="Show More" data-truncate-revealer-template="shared/templates/show_more_less" ue="truncate-revealer">SE Ranking is a robust SEO toolkit that best suits small to medium sized agencies and in-house teams. 
Unique and advanced datasets help SEO pros in developing and executing effective SEO strategies.

SE Ranking offers dedicated tools for automating every major SEO task, including keyword and competitive research, content creation and optimization, technical website audits, on-page optimization, backlink analysis and monitoring, position tracking, local SEO, and more.

SE Ranking leverages AI and NLP technologies to provide users with unique insights and recommendations. Delivering high-quality, accurate data is one of SE Ranking’s top priorities, and the SE Ranking team continually expands their datasets and finetunes their data processing algorithms to provide data that users can rely on.

Teams can benefit from SE Ranking’s automated reporting, White Label, and collaborative project management. Most subscription plans include extra user seats for team members and unlimited projects to accommodate all client needs. 

Designed specifically for small to mid-sized marketing agencies, SE Ranking’s Agency Pack provides unlimited reporting, a lead generation widget, WL, and extra client seats to help agencies better present their deliverables." data-truncate-revealer-show-less="Show Less" data-truncate-revealer-show-more="Show More" data-truncate-revealer-template="shared/templates/show_more_less" ue="truncate-revealer">SE Ranking is a robust SEO toolkit that best suits small to medium sized agencies and in-house teams. 
Unique and advanced datasets help SEO pros in developing and executing effective SEO strategies.

natalie@rankiq.co 

Our Founder is a Top Blogger &amp; SEO Expert. 
The man behind our AI software is Brandon Gaille. He hosts The Blogging Millionaire podcast and gets over 5 million monthly visitors to his personal blogs from organic Google search. 

Construct Blog Post Outlines in Minutes. 
The AI content report identifies the topics that Google's ranking algorithm wants you to cover, so that you can create a complete outline in a matter of minutes. 

Create Content that Ranks on Page One. 
The AI-powered writing assistant tells you what you need to add to your post, so you can build a comprehensive piece of content, that will be able to compete for a 1st page Google ranking. 

Optimize Old Posts for Big Traffic Gains. 
In less than 30 minutes, you can optimize an old underperforming post and put it in position to be a top performer. This is one of the easiest ways to increase your traffic and income. 

Make Perfect SEO'd Titles in 90 Seconds. 
The top 30 SERP analysis reveals the keywords that Google likes the most in titles. You'll be able to craft a top-notch title from the words that are proven to deliver the highest CTRs. 

Never Worry About KW Research Again. 
RankIQ has a hand-picked keyword library for every major blog niche (over 500 and counting). Each library is filled with the lowest competition phrases that also have high traffic potential." data-truncate-revealer-show-less="Show Less" data-truncate-revealer-show-more="Show More" data-truncate-revealer-template="shared/templates/show_more_less" ue="truncate-revealer">RankIQ's SEO toolset tells you what to put in your post and title, so you can write perfectly optimized content in half the time. data-truncate-revealer-limit="200" data-truncate-revealer-overflow-text="ic keywords for every niche. We are consistently ranked as the #1 SEO software in the world and have won 19 international awards. For enterprise queries, please contact our Head of Enterprise Relations, Natalie Gaille, here:
natalie@rankiq.co 

Our Founder is a Top Blogger &amp; SEO Expert. 
The man behind our AI software is Brandon Gaille. He hosts The Blogging Millionaire podcast and gets over 5 million monthly visitors to his personal blogs from organic Google search. 

Construct Blog Post Outlines in Minutes. 
The AI content report identifies the topics that Google's ranking algorithm wants you to cover, so that you can create a complete outline in a matter of minutes. 

Create Content that Ranks on Page One. 
The AI-powered writing assistant tells you what you need to add to your post, so you can build a comprehensive piece of content, that will be able to compete for a 1st page Google ranking. 

Optimize Old Posts for Big Traffic Gains. 
In less than 30 minutes, you can optimize an old underperforming post and put it in position to be a top performer. This is one of the easiest ways to increase your traffic and income. 

Make Perfect SEO'd Titles in 90 Seconds. 
The top 30 SERP analysis reveals the keywords that Google likes the most in titles. You'll be able to craft a top-notch title from the words that are proven to deliver the highest CTRs. 

Never Worry About KW Research Again. 
RankIQ has a hand-picked keyword library for every major blog niche (over 500 and counting). Each library is filled with the lowest competition phrases that also have high traffic potential." data-truncate-revealer-show-less="Show Less" data-truncate-revealer-show-more="Show More" data-truncate-revealer-template="shared/templates/show_more_less" ue="truncate-revealer">RankIQ's SEO toolset tells you what to put in your post and title, so you can write perfectly optimized content in half the time. It also has a hand-picked library of the lowest competition high-traff</span></p></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y pt-half pb-half-small-only"><div class="cell medium-4 d-f"><div class=\"js-truncate white-space-no-wrap link\"\u003e {{showMore}}\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003cspan class=\"hide-if-js\"\u003e{{truncatedText}}\u003c/span\u003e\n{{/truncated}}\n{{^truncated}}\n\u003ca href=\"#\" class=\"js-truncate white-space-no-wrap link\"\u003e {{showLess}}\u003c/a\u003e\n{{/truncated}}\n"</script><div data-nosnippet=""><p><span class="product-listing__paragraph" data-truncate-revealer-limit="200" data-truncate-revealer-overflow-text="al tools like the TF*IDF tool for content optimization and the Keyword-Research-Tool complete the Seobility all-in-one SEO software.

On-page SEO audit: all linked pages of a website are crawled and errors or problems with the on-page optimization are collected and clearly displayed. Each analysis has detailed information and tips on how to solve problems and optimize. For a continuous website review and tracking of the optimization progress, regular crawls can be scheduled. Seobility provides a detailed report after each crawl and notifies the user in case of severe problems.

Backlink Analysis: detailed reports about a websites backlinks, anchor texts, referring domains etc.. Furthermore, regularly  updated reports on new backlinks and lost backlinks provide actionable insight into this part of off-page SEO. Competitor analysis and linkbuilding recommendations complete this module.

Rank Tracking: daily updated desktop and mobile Google ranking data for your keywords. Use advanced features like keyword tagging, e.g. to analyze categories, or localized results. Keep an eye on your competitors by monitoring their performance.

Seobility SEO software is designed with clear a focus on quality and usability. Seobility is suitable for SEO professionals as well as SEO beginners." data-truncate-revealer-show-less="Show Less" data-truncate-revealer-show-more="Show More" data-truncate-revealer-template="shared/templates/show_more_less" ue="truncate-revealer">Seobility is the all-in-one SEO tool for better website rankings.

Seobility provides a comprehensive on-page SEO audit, backlink analysis and linkbuilding tools, as well as ranking tracking. description is provided by the seller." aria-labelledby="icon-label-a1cd60dba75d6558e937c4372603a269" role="img"><title id="icon-label-a1cd60dba75d6558e937c4372603a269">Information</title><path d="M256 48C141 48 48 141 48 256s93 208 208 208 208-93 208-208S371 48 256 48zm-4 104c11 0 20 9 20 20s-9 20-20 20-20-9-20-20 8-20 20-20zm36 200h-64v-8h16V224h-16v-8h48v128h16z"></path></svg></div><script type="text/template;name=shared/templates/show_more_less">"{{{description}}}\n{{#truncated}}\n\u003ca href=\"#\" class=\"js-truncate white-space-no-wrap link\"\u003e {{showMore}}\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003cspan class=\"hide-if-js\"\u003e{{truncatedText}}\u003c/span\u003e\n{{/truncated}}\n{{^truncated}}\n\u003ca href=\"#\" class=\"js-truncate white-space-no-wrap link\"\u003e {{showLess}}\u003c/a\u003e\n{{/truncated}}\n"</script><div data-nosnippet=""><p><span class="product-listing__paragraph" data-truncate-revealer-limit="200" data-truncate-revealer-overflow-text="al tools like the TF*IDF tool for content optimization and the Keyword-Research-Tool complete the Seobility all-in-one SEO software.

On-page SEO audit: all linked pages of a website are crawled and errors or problems with the on-page optimization are collected and clearly displayed. Each analysis has detailed information and tips on how to solve problems and optimize. For a continuous website review and tracking of the optimization progress, regular crawls can be scheduled. Seobility provides a detailed report after each crawl and notifies the user in case of severe problems.

Backlink Analysis: detailed reports about a websites backlinks, anchor texts, referring domains etc.. Furthermore, regularly  updated reports on new backlinks and lost backlinks provide actionable insight into this part of off-page SEO. Competitor analysis and linkbuilding recommendations complete this module.

Rank Tracking: daily updated desktop and mobile Google ranking data for your keywords. Use advanced features like keyword tagging, e.g. to analyze categories, or localized results. Keep an eye on your competitors by monitoring their performance.

Seobility SEO software is designed with clear a focus on quality and usability. Seobility is suitable for SEO professionals as well as SEO beginners." data-truncate-revealer-show-less="Show Less" data-truncate-revealer-show-more="Show More" data-truncate-revealer-template="shared/templates/show_more_less" ue="truncate-revealer">Seobility is the all-in-one SEO tool for better website rankings.

Seobility provides a comprehensive on-page SEO audit, backlink analysis and linkbuilding tools, as well as ranking tracking. data-truncate-revealer-limit="200" data-truncate-revealer-overflow-text="roduct managers.

More websites you working on, more time you spent on a daily routine when checking data from Google Analytics, Google Search Console, rank tracker, site crawler in different tabs. Sitechecker will reduce this time due to one dashboard with all important statistics for all websites.

A few words about each of the tool inside the platform

1. Site Audit detects the issues that slow down your SEO growth and gives specific tips on how to fix them.
2. Site Monitoring collects a history of important SEO changes on the website and sends you email alerts when something critical happens.
3. Rank Tracker tracks your website rankings every day and helps to research how SERP changes for any keyword that is valuable for you.
4. Dashboard will give you a bird's eye view of all the main metrics of your project.
5. Insights provides you with different templates that you can use to analyze the website's data. 
6. Backlink Tracker monitors backlinks and shows which one has lost or became non-indexable.
7. Google Analytics integration helps import traffic and transaction stats.
8. Google Search Console integration helps find search performance insights that are not available in Google Search Console by default.
9. On-Page Checker helps run a quick on-page SEO analysis for any page and find mistakes in the text content, links, images, meta tags, and page speed.
10. Link Strategy helps research competitors’ link building strategies." data-truncate-revealer-show-less="Show Less" data-truncate-revealer-show-more="Show More" data-truncate-revealer-template="shared/templates/show_more_less" ue="truncate-revealer">Sitechecker is an easy-to-use platform to measure, track, and improve your search visibility. data-truncate-revealer-limit="200" data-truncate-revealer-overflow-text="roduct managers.

More websites you working on, more time you spent on a daily routine when checking data from Google Analytics, Google Search Console, rank tracker, site crawler in different tabs. Sitechecker will reduce this time due to one dashboard with all important statistics for all websites.

A few words about each of the tool inside the platform

1. Site Audit detects the issues that slow down your SEO growth and gives specific tips on how to fix them.
2. Site Monitoring collects a history of important SEO changes on the website and sends you email alerts when something critical happens.
3. Rank Tracker tracks your website rankings every day and helps to research how SERP changes for any keyword that is valuable for you.
4. Dashboard will give you a bird's eye view of all the main metrics of your project.
5. Insights provides you with different templates that you can use to analyze the website's data. 
6. Backlink Tracker monitors backlinks and shows which one has lost or became non-indexable.
7. Google Analytics integration helps import traffic and transaction stats.
8. Google Search Console integration helps find search performance insights that are not available in Google Search Console by default.
9. On-Page Checker helps run a quick on-page SEO analysis for any page and find mistakes in the text content, links, images, meta tags, and page speed.
10. Link Strategy helps research competitors’ link building strategies." data-truncate-revealer-show-less="Show Less" data-truncate-revealer-show-more="Show More" data-truncate-revealer-template="shared/templates/show_more_less" ue="truncate-revealer">Sitechecker is an easy-to-use platform to measure, track, and improve your search visibility. That’s where ContentKing for Conductor comes in. 

As the only real-time SEO monitoring and auditing platform, ContentKing keeps track of everything happening on your site as it happens. If links suddenly break or pages become non-indexable or a page title changes — you’re covered. 

ContentKing continuously monitors your site, alerts you to on-page issues and changes in real time, and gives you the opportunity to fix on-page SEO problems before your rankings are impacted. 

No more waiting for a crawl. No more working with lagging data. And no more unnoticed issues. 

You’ll have eyes on your site 24/7 and a user-friendly interface that gives you a complete overview of your SEO performance so that you can transform data into actionable insights. All in real time.

That’s where ContentKing for Conductor comes in. 

As the only real-time SEO monitoring and auditing platform, ContentKing keeps track of everything happening on your site as it happens. If links suddenly break or pages become non-indexable or a page title changes — you’re covered. 

ContentKing continuously monitors your site, alerts you to on-page issues and changes in real time, and gives you the opportunity to fix on-page SEO problems before your rankings are impacted. 

No more waiting for a crawl. No more working with lagging data. And no more unnoticed issues. 

You’ll have eyes on your site 24/7 and a user-friendly interface that gives you a complete overview of your SEO performance so that you can transform data into actionable insights. All in real time.

data-truncate-revealer-limit="200" data-truncate-revealer-overflow-text="s expert-led services.

The LocaliQ platform is powered by proprietary cross-media optimization technology. The technology allows customers to optimize ad spend in real-time across multiple channels, saving time and ensuring real results.

LocaliQ's products and services include:
- Listings
- Websites &amp; Landing Pages
- SEO
- Social Media Marketing
- Search Ads
- Display Ads
- Video Ads
- Social Ads
- Targeted Email Marketing
- Custom Promotions
- Marketing Dashboard
- Chat
- Scheduling

LocaliQ is part of Gannett, a global media company that delivers local and national news to millions of people every day. Gannett’s business solutions, including LocaliQ and USA Today Network Media Solutions, provide businesses – both big and small – with access to the audiences and technology solutions they need to prosper. In order to align all of Gannett's digital marketing solutions under a single brand identity, the ReachLocal and ThriveHive brands were consolidated under the LocaliQ name." data-truncate-revealer-show-less="Show Less" data-truncate-revealer-show-more="Show More" data-truncate-revealer-template="shared/templates/show_more_less" ue="truncate-revealer">LocaliQ is a digital marketing platform that helps businesses find, convert, and keep customers with a suite of marketing automation, channel campaign management, lead dashboard and insight tools, plu</span></p></div><div data-truncate-revealer-overflow-text="s expert-led services.

The LocaliQ platform is powered by proprietary cross-media optimization technology. The technology allows customers to optimize ad spend in real-time across multiple channels, saving time and ensuring real results.

LocaliQ's products and services include:
- Listings
- Websites &amp; Landing Pages
- SEO
- Social Media Marketing
- Search Ads
- Display Ads
- Video Ads
- Social Ads
- Targeted Email Marketing
- Custom Promotions
- Marketing Dashboard
- Chat
- Scheduling

LocaliQ is part of Gannett, a global media company that delivers local and national news to millions of people every day. Gannett’s business solutions, including LocaliQ and USA Today Network Media Solutions, provide businesses – both big and small – with access to the audiences and technology solutions they need to prosper. In order to align all of Gannett's digital marketing solutions under a single brand identity, the ReachLocal and ThriveHive brands were consolidated under the LocaliQ name." data-truncate-revealer-limit="200" data-truncate-revealer-overflow-text=" competitor analysis, backlink analysis, rank tracking and SERP analysis.

The toolset has a keyword tool that helps SEOs to see competitors' rankings for the top keywords, find keyword ideas with historical search volumes and trends. It includes search results for more than 50k locations so marketers can optimize the content on their websites accordingly and get more organic traffic.

Marketers can use the SERP analysis tool to find out how hard it is to rank on the first page thanks to detailed SERP preview with authority metrics and SERP features that influence the click-through rate.

The rank tracking tool comes with daily rankings, aggregate metrics that show the overall progress and with interactive shareable ranking reports.

Backlink analysis can be done via their other tool that calculates the link strength, categorizes backlinks and shows a website preview to evaluate the potential of the referring websites.

If you don't want to use the web apps they have a browser extension for Chrome and Firefox that use the key data from the tools." data-truncate-revealer-show-less="Show Less" data-truncate-revealer-show-more="Show More" data-truncate-revealer-template="shared/templates/show_more_less" ue="truncate-revealer">Mangools is an SEO toolset that's great for bloggers, affiliate marketers, SMEs or SEO agencies. It's particularly popular because of the design and ease of use. data-truncate-revealer-limit="200" data-truncate-revealer-overflow-text=" competitor analysis, backlink analysis, rank tracking and SERP analysis.

The toolset has a keyword tool that helps SEOs to see competitors' rankings for the top keywords, find keyword ideas with historical search volumes and trends. It includes search results for more than 50k locations so marketers can optimize the content on their websites accordingly and get more organic traffic.

Marketers can use the SERP analysis tool to find out how hard it is to rank on the first page thanks to detailed SERP preview with authority metrics and SERP features that influence the click-through rate.

The rank tracking tool comes with daily rankings, aggregate metrics that show the overall progress and with interactive shareable ranking reports.

Backlink analysis can be done via their other tool that calculates the link strength, categorizes backlinks and shows a website preview to evaluate the potential of the referring websites.

If you don't want to use the web apps they have a browser extension for Chrome and Firefox that use the key data from the tools." data-truncate-revealer-show-less="Show Less" data-truncate-revealer-show-more="Show More" data-truncate-revealer-template="shared/templates/show_more_less" ue="truncate-revealer">Mangools is an SEO toolset that's great for bloggers, affiliate marketers, SMEs or SEO agencies. It's particularly popular because of the design and ease of use.       <path d="M3.896 0a3.896 3.896 0 1 1 0 7.792 3.896 3.896 0 0 1 0-7.792Z"></path>
    </clippath>
    <clippath id="d">
      <path d="M13.938 0a1.063 1.063 0 0 1 0 2.125H1.062a1.062 1.062 0 1 1 0-2.125h12.876Z"></path>
    </clippath>
  </defs>
  <g clip-path="url(#a)">
    <path d="M3.896 7.792a3.896 3.896 0 1 0 0-7.792 3.896 3.896 0 0 0 0 7.792Z" stroke="#252530" stroke-width="4" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="5"></path>
  </g>
  <g clip-path="url(#b)" transform="translate(6.375 2.833)">
    <path fill="#252530" d="M0 0h15v2.125H0V0z"></path>
  </g>
  <g clip-path="url(#c)" transform="rotate(-180 10.833 8.5)">
    <path d="M3.896 7.792a3.896 3.896 0 1 0 0-7.792 3.896 3.896 0 0 0 0 7.792Z" stroke="#252530" stroke-width="4" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="5"></path>
  </g>
  <g clip-path="url(#d)" transform="rotate(-180 7.646 7.083)">
    <path fill="#252530" d="M0 0h15v2.125H0V0z"></path>
  </g>

class="mb-half flex ai-c jc-sb"><h2 class="l1 c-purple-100">Learn More About SEO Tools</h2></div>
<div id="what-are-seo-tools" data-magellan-target="what-are-seo-tools" itemtype="https://schema.org/Question" itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="">
<h3 itemprop="name">What are SEO Tools?</h3>
<span itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer" itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope=""><span itemprop="text">
<p><span>Search engine optimization (SEO) is the practice of optimizing web pages or domains to increase user traffic to a given website or piece of content via search engines. It involves staying up-to-date on search best practices and differences in search engine algorithms and using various tools and metrics to get a holistic picture of organic search. </span></p>
<p><span>Many SEO analysis tools consolidate metric testing and monitoring into a unified solution. Still, numerous specialized point solutions are tailored to address specific metrics, such as keyword research or link removal.</span></p>
<p><span>SEO products are typically built to cater to a single search engine or the most popular per region. As such, businesses must ensure they have an idea of the search engine(s) on which they wish to be found. </span></p>
<p><span>While Google has the biggest audience, that also means there is more competition, especially for highly sought-after terms. If choosing to target another search network, it is essential to ensure that the selected tool aids in increasing the rank on that platform.</span></p>
</span></span>
</div>
<div id="what-are-the-common-features-of-seo-tools" data-magellan-target="what-are-the-common-features-of-seo-tools" itemtype="https://schema.org/Question" itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="">
<h3 itemprop="name"><span>What are the common features of SEO tools? </span></h3>
<span itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer" itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope=""><span itemprop="text">
<p><span>The features listed below are commonly found in SEO solutions, but this list is by no means exhaustive. These features empower users to understand, enhance, and monitor their website's performance in search engine results.</span></p>
<ul>
<li>
<strong>Backlink analysis:</strong><span> It assists in building additional high-quality linkbacks while providing in-depth insights into the impact of existing linkbacks on the site's SEO. </span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>On-page SEO analysis:</strong><span> Beyond evaluating a URL based on targeted keywords, it thoroughly examines the content, meta tags, and other on-page elements to ensure alignment with SEO best practices set by each search engine.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Site audits:</strong><span> It identifies potential issues that search engine crawlers may encounter with a website’s pages. Checking for technical SEO issues, broken links, missing meta descriptions, and duplicate content, among other things, is included in improving the SEO performance.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Local marketing:</strong><span> Businesses can use it to manage their online presence efficiently in various local search engines, including platforms like Google Business, Yelp, and Bing Local. It ensures accurate and consistent business information across all platforms and excellent local search visibility.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Keyword analysis:</strong><span> It is crucial for tailoring the content and SEO strategy to target traffic, driving relevant keywords. It identifies the right keywords and analyzes their competitiveness and search volume. </span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>SERP rank tracking:</strong><span> It tracks organic keyword rankings targeted for a specific URL and provides history reports for multiple search engines. </span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Brand alerts:</strong><span> It provides reports of when a brand or domain is mentioned or linked to from other domains.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Social analytics:</strong><span> It social mentions and linkbacks relative to SEO, providing insights into the effectiveness of social media strategies in driving organic search traffic.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Competitive analysis:</strong><span> It enables side-by-side comparisons with competitors. This includes analyzing backlink profiles, SERP results, domain authority, and other critical SEO metrics. </span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Comprehensive reporting: </strong><span>It empowers users to generate professional reports and share data through user-friendly dashboards. The reports include keyword performance across search engines, backlink health, link-building opportunities, technical SEO issues, and opportunities to optimize content for improved visibility and organic traffic.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Integrations:</strong><span> It integrates with website analytics tools such as Google Analytics, webmaster tools, etc., to provide a holistic view of the website's performance. </span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Other features of SEO Tools:</strong><a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/seo/f/content-optimization" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"> </a><a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/seo/f/content-optimization" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Content Optimization</a><span>,</span><a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/seo/f/keyword-research" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"> </a><a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/seo/f/keyword-research" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Keyword Research</a><span>,</span><a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/seo/f/link-building" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"> </a><a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/seo/f/link-building" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Link Building</a><span>,</span><a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/seo/f/rank-tracking" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"> </a><a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/seo/f/rank-tracking" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Rank Tracking</a><span>,</span><a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/seo/f/seo-audit" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"> </a><a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/seo/f/seo-audit" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">SEO Audit</a>
</li>
</ul>
</span></span>
</div>
<div id="what-are-the-benefits-of-seo-tools" data-magellan-target="what-are-the-benefits-of-seo-tools" itemtype="https://schema.org/Question" itemprop="mainEntity" itemscope="">
<h3 itemprop="name"><span>What are the benefits of SEO tools?</span></h3>
<span itemtype="https://schema.org/Answer" itemprop="acceptedAnswer" itemscope=""><span itemprop="text">
<p><span>Search engines have revolutionized how people access relevant content daily, prioritizing delivering the best results. With the standards of the space in constant flux, keeping up with the best practices of SEO is an ever-evolving challenge. </span></p>
<p><span>For businesses seeking to optimize their online presence, SEO tools are a cornerstone for digital success, providing many benefits to practitioners who use them effectively.</span></p>
<ul>
<li>
<strong>Optimized website performance: </strong><span>SEO tools allow for peak SERP performance, strategically targeting keywords that enhance channel visibility and impact.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Agile response to algorithm changes: </strong><span>With real-time updates, swift adaptation to evolving algorithms and maintaining a competitive edge online becomes easy.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Detailed performance insights: </strong><span>Comprehensive reports provided by SEO tools offer actionable insights into website performance and rankings for continuous improvement.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Competitive edge through analysis: </strong><span>SEO tools' competitor analysis feature proactively tracks changes in rankings and allows timely adjustments for sustained competitiveness.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Strategic visibility enhancement: </strong><span>SEO tools guide in selecting impactful keywords and creating compelling content, boosting online visibility.</span>
</li>
</ul>
</span></span>
</div>
<div id="who-uses-seo-tools" data-magellan-target="who-uses-seo-tools">
<h3><span>Who uses SEO tools?</span></h3>
<p><span>SEO can make or break content success, but not all levels of an organization will need to be involved in the SEO process. Instead, the responsibility of SEO typically falls on specific individuals within an organization. </span></p>
<p><span>Additionally, plenty of self-employed content creators will rely on SEO to ensure their content ranks well and can be found easily via search engines.</span></p>
<ul>
<li>
<strong>Content marketers</strong><span>: SEO is a staple within content marketing. Search engines are a primary channel through which potential buyers find services and products. Within organizations, content marketing teams or dedicated SEO specialists work with SEO to ensure their content performs the best.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Digital marketing agencies</strong><span>: SEO software is indispensable for </span><a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/digital-marketing" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">digital marketing</a><span> agencies. From keyword optimization to performance tracking, agencies use it to elevate their client’s online presence and drive tangible results.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>E-commerce platforms</strong><span>: For </span><a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/e-commerce-platforms" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">e-commerce platforms</a><span> seeking increased visibility and higher conversion rates, SEO solutions can have a large impact. By optimizing product listings and implementing other effective SEO strategies, more qualified leads are attracted, boosting sales and gaining a competitive advantage.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Startups and small businesses</strong><span>: SEO tools are a cost-effective way to establish a strong online presence for small businesses. These tools empower resource-limited enterprises to compete with larger competitors by implementing targeted SEO strategies that attract niche audiences.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Content creators</strong><span>: The term "content creator" can apply to everyone from bloggers to YouTube stars to Instagram influencers. People from all these backgrounds employ features like hashtag tracking and brand mentions to help their content perform in a potentially saturated environment.</span>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div id="seo-tools-pricing" data-magellan-target="seo-tools-pricing">
<h3><span>SEO tools pricing</span></h3>
<p><span>Different SEO tools have varying pricing structures based on the features and capabilities offered. Users should carefully assess their specific requirements and how pricing aligns with their budget.  </span></p>
<ul>
<li>
<strong>Freemium plans:</strong><span> With these plans, limited features are available in the free version, allowing users to access basic functionalities. Premium features, however, are often unlocked after opting for a subscription.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Subscription-based plans:</strong><span> Most SEO tools operate on a subscription model, charging a monthly or annual fee for a full features suite. The cost varies based on factors like the number of users, websites, or keywords tracked.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Tiered pricing:</strong><span> Tiered pricing plans cater to different user needs. While basic plans may cover essential features, higher-tier plans offer advanced functionalities, analytics, and support.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Usage-based pricing:</strong><span> Some tools can structure their pricing based on usage metrics. In such a case, users pay according to their specific usage requirements.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Custom enterprise plans:</strong><span> For large businesses with unique needs, custom enterprise plans are made. These plans often include personalized features, extensive support, and scalability.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p><span>In addition, </span><a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/seo-tools/free" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">free SEO tools</a><span> and software provide complimentary trials, enabling users to perform essential searches and evaluate the platform before deciding on a paid subscription. </span></p>
<p><span>Some free SEO tools include:</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span>Ahrefs</span></li>
<li><span>Google Keyword Planner</span></li>
<li><span>Semrush</span></li>
<li><span>AnswerThePublic</span></li>
<li><span>Woorank</span></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div id="software-and-services-related-to-seo-tools" data-magellan-target="software-and-services-related-to-seo-tools">
<h3><span>Software and services related to SEO tools</span></h3>
<ul>
<li>
<a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/local-seo" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Local SEO software</a><span>: Local SEO software functions like any other SEO tool but specifically targets local customers. This can be especially critical for small businesses, such as restaurants, services, and small retailers, that must rank well in and advertise to their immediate community.</span>
</li>
<li>
<a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/search-advertising" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">Search advertising software</a><span>: Search advertising software, like SEO, is concerned with ranking for keywords in popular search engines. However, search advertising tools are concerned with ranking for the sake of presenting marketing material and ads within search engines. SEO tools ensure a business’s main website ranks well in search engines.</span>
</li>
<li>
<a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/seo-services" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">SEO services providers</a><span>: SEO services providers allow businesses to optimize their websites without purchasing a dedicated SEO software tool. For some companies, particularly small ones, the upfront cost of SEO tools can be high, and they may not need to monitor their backlinks and rankings often.</span>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div id="challenges-with-seo-tools" data-magellan-target="challenges-with-seo-tools">
<h3><span>Challenges with SEO tools</span></h3>
<p><span>While SEO software is an invaluable tool for any business, offering helpful insights and functionalities, users may encounter challenges with algorithm changes, data inaccuracy, and learning curves.</span></p>
<ul>
<li>
<strong>Dynamic algorithm changes: </strong><span>The fluid nature of SEO algorithms is a significant challenge for accurate performance tracking and optimization. Search engines continually refine their algorithms to prioritize relevant content, making it difficult to keep pace with the rapid changes. </span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Emergence of new SERP enhancements: </strong><span>New enhancements in search results, such as featured snippets, play a pivotal role in search rankings and the visibility of brands. Measuring the effectiveness of these new features can be challenging, restraining businesses from fully optimizing their web pages for the latest SEO practices.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Consistent updates: </strong><span>SEO tools require constant updates to align with the latest SEO standards. Without regular updates, tools may become outdated, compromising their effectiveness. </span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Potential data inaccuracies: </strong><span>Any lag in data updates may lead to potential inaccuracies in the provided information, hampering optimization efforts.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>User learning curve: </strong><span>The dynamic nature of SEO and the complexity of some SEO tools can contribute to a steep learning curve for beginners. Businesses may face challenges in maximizing a new tool's full potential, requiring dedicated training and skill development efforts.</span>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div id="how-to-choose-the-best-seo-tools" data-magellan-target="how-to-choose-the-best-seo-tools">
<h3><span>How to choose the best SEO tools</span></h3>
<p><span>Choosing the right SEO tools is more than just about optimization. It's about selecting tools that contribute to the success of digital marketing strategies over the long term. To make an informed choice, buyers must consider the following key points:</span></p>
<ul>
<li>
<strong>Define business goals: </strong><span>Buyers should</span><strong> </strong><span>clearly outline the SEO goals, whether they are improving rankings for branded or non-branded keywords, boosting organic traffic, or enhancing content visibility. It guides the selection of tools aligned with the business’s strategic objectives.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Check for features and functionality: </strong><span>Buyers must</span><strong> </strong><span>thoroughly assess the offered features. They should seek functionalities that address the desired challenges, such as keyword research, competitor tracking, and real-time data insights. Buyers should choose tools with a comprehensive feature set tailored to their goals.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Ascertain reliability:</strong><span> Buyers must check the data sources and methodology used to ensure reliability. They should look for tools that provide accurate information on keyword rankings, backlinks, and other relevant metrics.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Consider scalability and integration: </strong><span>Buyers must consider the scalability to accommodate business growth. They should choose software that integrates with other tools in their tech stack, such as </span><a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/analytics-platforms" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">analytics platforms</a><span>, </span><a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/content-management" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">content management systems</a><span>, and other </span><a href="https://www.g2.com/categories/marketing-automation" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">marketing automation tools</a><span>.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Analyze automation available:</strong><span> To minimize manual tasks and enhance overall efficiency, buyers should look for tools with automation features such as keyword ideas, on-page optimization guidance, and assistance in content creation.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Ask for customer support and training: </strong><span>Buyers must</span><strong> </strong><span>prioritize tools with responsive customer support and accessible training resources. A strong support system ensures prompt issue resolution and maximizes tool utility.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Check for real-time data and updates: </strong><span>Buyers should</span><strong> </strong><span>opt for SEO tools that provide real-time data insights and frequent updates to adapt to algorithm changes swiftly.</span>
</li>
<li>
<strong>Research and Compare: </strong><span>Buyers must</span><strong> </strong><span>conduct thorough research and read reviews, user testimonials, and expert opinions to understand the strengths and weaknesses of each tool. They can compare features, pricing, and user experiences.</span>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div id="seo-tools-trends" data-magellan-target="seo-tools-trends">
<h3><span>SEO tools trends</span></h3>
<ul><li>
<strong>Bundling</strong><span>: Many SEO software tools have begun adding more features to their product offerings as SEO becomes more holistic. Effective and long-term SEO strategies encompass several metrics, and businesses would be hard-pressed to buy different tools to monitor disparate measures. </span>This is reflected in the most popular SEO software options, with the most inclusive products floating to the top regarding widespread usage. While point solutions still exist, SEO suites are more common in the current market.</li></ul>
<p><br></p>
</div>
